title: Angela Desveaux
text:
Angela Desveaux is a Canadian singer-songwriter, based in <a href="Montreal">Montreal</a>, Quebec, whose style blends a diverse mix of pop, rock and <a href="country%20music">country</a> influences.
Background.
Raised on <a href="Cape%20Breton%20Island">Cape Breton Island</a>, Desveaux later moved to Montreal and began performing as a vocalist with local country and folk bands, and released a self-titled independent album in 2005. She subsequently met <a href="Howard%20Bilerman">Howard Bilerman</a>, a producer and musician associated with <a href="Arcade%20Fire">Arcade Fire</a>, who helped her to assemble a band and to record her 2006 album "<a href="Wandering%20Eyes">Wandering Eyes</a>".
She released her third album, "The Mighty Ship", in 2008.
Desveaux's supporting band currently consists of Julie Doiron on guitar, Eric Digras on bass and Gilles Castilloux on drums.
